metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: PHP File Upload
With PHP, it is easy to upload files to the server.
content.html: With PHP, it is easy to upload files to the server.

content.text: However, with ease comes danger, so always be careful when allowing file uploads!
content.html: However, with ease comes danger, so always be careful when allowing file uploads!

content.text: Configure The "php.ini" File
First, ensure that PHP is configured to allow file uploads.
content.html: First, ensure that PHP is configured to allow file uploads.

content.text: In your "php.ini" file, search for the file_uploads directive, and set it to On:
content.html: In your "php.ini" file, search for the file_uploads directive, and set it to On:

content.text: Create The HTML Form
Next, create an HTML form that allow users to choose the image file they want to upload:
content.html: Next, create an HTML form that allow users to choose the image file they want to upload:

content.code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>

<form action="upload.php" method="post"
enctype="multipart/form-data">
  Select image to upload:
  <input type="file" name="fileToUpload" id="fileToUpload">

<input type="submit" value="Upload Image" name="submit">

</form>

</body>
</html>
content.code_html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>

<form action="upload.php" method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data">
  Select image to upload:
  <input type="file" name="fileToUpload" id="fileToUpload">
  <input type="submit" value="Upload Image" name="submit">
</form>

</body>
</html>

content.text: Some rules to follow for the HTML form above:
content.html: Some rules to follow for the HTML form above:

content.text: Without the requirements above, the file upload will not work.
content.html: Without the requirements above, the file upload will not work.

content.text: Other things to notice:
content.html: Other things to notice:

content.text: The form above sends data to a file called "upload.php", which we will create next.
content.html: The form above sends data to a file called "upload.php", which we will create next.

content.text: Create The Upload File PHP Script
The "upload.php" file contains the code for uploading a file:
content.html: The "upload.php" file contains the code for uploading a file:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
<?php$target_dir = "uploads/";$target_file = $target_dir . basename($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["name"]);$uploadOk = 1;$imageFileType = 
  strtolower(pathinfo($target_file,PATHINFO_EXTENSION));// Check if image file is a actual image or fake imageif(isset($_POST["submit"])) {
    $check = getimagesize($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"]);  if($check !== false) {    echo "File is an image - " . $check["mime"] . ".";    $uploadOk = 1;
    } else {    echo "File is not an image.";
      $uploadOk = 0;  }}?>
// Check if image file is a actual image or fake image

content.code:

strtolower(pathinfo($target_file,PATHINFO_EXTENSION));// Check if image file is a actual image or fake imageif(isset($_POST["submit"])) {
$check = getimagesize($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"]);  if($check !== false) {    echo "File is an image - " . $check["mime"] . ".";    $uploadOk = 1;
} else {    echo "File is not an image.";
$uploadOk = 0;  }}?>

syntax_highlighting.text:
<?php$target_dir = "uploads/";$target_file = $target_dir . basename($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["name"]);$uploadOk = 1;$imageFileType = 
  strtolower(pathinfo($target_file,PATHINFO_EXTENSION));// Check if image file is a actual image or fake imageif(isset($_POST["submit"])) {
    $check = getimagesize($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"]);  if($check !== false) {    echo "File is an image - " . $check["mime"] . ".";    $uploadOk = 1;
    } else {    echo "File is not an image.";
      $uploadOk = 0;  }}?>
// Check if image file is a actual image or fake image

content.code_html:
<?php
$target_dir = "uploads/";
$target_file = $target_dir . basename($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["name"]);
$uploadOk = 1;
$imageFileType = strtolower(pathinfo($target_file,PATHINFO_EXTENSION));
// Check if image file is a actual image or fake image
if(isset($_POST["submit"])) {
  $check = getimagesize($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"]);
  if($check !== false) {
    echo "File is an image - " . $check["mime"] . ".";
    $uploadOk = 1;
  } else {
    echo "File is not an image.";
    $uploadOk = 0;
  }
}
?>

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
<?php$target_dir = "uploads/";$target_file = $target_dir . basename($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["name"]);$uploadOk = 1;$imageFileType = 
  strtolower(pathinfo($target_file,PATHINFO_EXTENSION));// Check if image file is a actual image or fake imageif(isset($_POST["submit"])) {
    $check = getimagesize($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"]);  if($check !== false) {    echo "File is an image - " . $check["mime"] . ".";    $uploadOk = 1;
    } else {    echo "File is not an image.";
      $uploadOk = 0;  }}?>
// Check if image file is a actual image or fake image

content.text: PHP script explained:
content.html: PHP script explained:

content.text: Note: You will need to create a new directory called "uploads" in the directory where "upload.php" file resides. The uploaded files will be saved there.
content.html: Note: You will need to create a new directory called "uploads" in the directory where "upload.php" file resides. The uploaded files will be saved there.

content.text: Check if File Already Exists
Now we can add some restrictions.
content.html: Now we can add some restrictions.

content.text: First, we will check if the file already exists in the "uploads" folder. If it does, an error message is displayed, and $uploadOk is set to 0:
content.html: First, we will check if the file already exists in the "uploads" folder. If it does, an error message is displayed, and $uploadOk is set to 0:

content.code_html:
// Check if file already exists
if (file_exists($target_file)) {
  echo "Sorry, file already exists.";
  $uploadOk = 0;
}

content.text: Limit File Size
The file input field in our HTML form above is named "fileToUpload".
content.html: The file input field in our HTML form above is named "fileToUpload".

content.text: Now, we want to check the size of the file. If the file is larger than 500KB, an error message is displayed, and $uploadOk is set to 0:
content.html: Now, we want to check the size of the file. If the file is larger than 500KB, an error message is displayed, and $uploadOk is set to 0:

content.code_html:
// Check file size
if ($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["size"] > 500000) {
  echo "Sorry, your file is too large.";
  $uploadOk = 0;
}

content.text: Limit File Type
The code below only allows users to upload JPG, JPEG, PNG, and GIF files. All other file types gives an error message before setting $uploadOk to 0:
content.html: The code below only allows users to upload JPG, JPEG, PNG, and GIF files. All other file types gives an error message before setting $uploadOk to 0:

content.code_html:
// Allow certain file formats
if($imageFileType != "jpg" && $imageFileType != "png" && $imageFileType != "jpeg"
&& $imageFileType != "gif" ) {
  echo "Sorry, only JPG, JPEG, PNG & GIF files are allowed.";
  $uploadOk = 0;
}

content.text: Complete Upload File PHP Script
The complete "upload.php" file now looks like this:
content.html: The complete "upload.php" file now looks like this:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
<?php$target_dir = "uploads/";$target_file = $target_dir . basename($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["name"]);$uploadOk = 1;$imageFileType = 
  strtolower(pathinfo($target_file,PATHINFO_EXTENSION));// Check if image file is a actual image or fake imageif(isset($_POST["submit"])) {  $check = getimagesize($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"]);  if($check !== false) {    echo "File is an image - " . $check["mime"] . ".";
      $uploadOk = 1;  } else {    echo "File is not an image.";
      $uploadOk = 0;  }}// Check if file already existsif (file_exists($target_file)) {
    echo "Sorry, file already exists.";  $uploadOk = 0;}
 // Check file sizeif ($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["size"] > 500000) {  echo "Sorry, your file is too large.";  $uploadOk = 0;
 }// Allow certain file formatsif($imageFileType != "jpg" && $imageFileType != "png" && $imageFileType != "jpeg"&& $imageFileType != "gif" ) {  echo "Sorry, only JPG, JPEG, PNG & GIF files are allowed.";  $uploadOk = 0;}// Check if $uploadOk is set to 0 by an errorif ($uploadOk == 0) {  echo "Sorry, your file was not uploaded.";// if everything is ok, try to upload file} else {
    if (move_uploaded_file($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"], $target_file)) {
      echo "The file ". htmlspecialchars( basename( $_FILES["fileToUpload"]["name"])). 
  " has been uploaded.";
    } else {    echo "Sorry, there was an error uploading your file.";
    }}?>
// Check if image file is a actual image or fake image
"Sorry, only JPG, JPEG, PNG & GIF files are allowed."
// Check if $uploadOk is set to 0 by an error
// if everything is ok, try to upload file
"Sorry, there was an error uploading your file."

strtolower(pathinfo($target_file,PATHINFO_EXTENSION));// Check if image file is a actual image or fake imageif(isset($_POST["submit"])) {  $check = getimagesize($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"]);  if($check !== false) {    echo "File is an image - " . $check["mime"] . ".";
$uploadOk = 1;  } else {    echo "File is not an image.";
$uploadOk = 0;  }}// Check if file already existsif (file_exists($target_file)) {
echo "Sorry, file already exists.";  $uploadOk = 0;}
// Check file sizeif ($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["size"] > 500000) {  echo "Sorry, your file is too large.";  $uploadOk = 0;
}// Allow certain file formatsif($imageFileType != "jpg" && $imageFileType != "png" && $imageFileType != "jpeg"&& $imageFileType != "gif" ) {  echo "Sorry, only JPG, JPEG, PNG & GIF files are allowed.";  $uploadOk = 0;}// Check if $uploadOk is set to 0 by an errorif ($uploadOk == 0) {  echo "Sorry, your file was not uploaded.";// if everything is ok, try to upload file} else {
if (move_uploaded_file($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"], $target_file)) {
echo "The file ". htmlspecialchars( basename( $_FILES["fileToUpload"]["name"])).
" has been uploaded.";
} else {    echo "Sorry, there was an error uploading your file.";
}}?>

<?php$target_dir = "uploads/";$target_file = $target_dir . basename($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["name"]);$uploadOk = 1;$imageFileType = 
  strtolower(pathinfo($target_file,PATHINFO_EXTENSION));// Check if image file is a actual image or fake imageif(isset($_POST["submit"])) {  $check = getimagesize($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"]);  if($check !== false) {    echo "File is an image - " . $check["mime"] . ".";
      $uploadOk = 1;  } else {    echo "File is not an image.";
      $uploadOk = 0;  }}// Check if file already existsif (file_exists($target_file)) {
    echo "Sorry, file already exists.";  $uploadOk = 0;}
 // Check file sizeif ($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["size"] > 500000) {  echo "Sorry, your file is too large.";  $uploadOk = 0;
 }// Allow certain file formatsif($imageFileType != "jpg" && $imageFileType != "png" && $imageFileType != "jpeg"&& $imageFileType != "gif" ) {  echo "Sorry, only JPG, JPEG, PNG & GIF files are allowed.";  $uploadOk = 0;}// Check if $uploadOk is set to 0 by an errorif ($uploadOk == 0) {  echo "Sorry, your file was not uploaded.";// if everything is ok, try to upload file} else {
    if (move_uploaded_file($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"], $target_file)) {
      echo "The file ". htmlspecialchars( basename( $_FILES["fileToUpload"]["name"])). 
 " has been uploaded.";
    } else {    echo "Sorry, there was an error uploading your file.";
    }}?>
// Check if image file is a actual image or fake image
"Sorry, only JPG, JPEG, PNG & GIF files are allowed."
// Check if $uploadOk is set to 0 by an error
// if everything is ok, try to upload file

content.code_html:
<?php
$target_dir = "uploads/";
$target_file = $target_dir . basename($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["name"]);
$uploadOk = 1;
$imageFileType = strtolower(pathinfo($target_file,PATHINFO_EXTENSION));

// Check if image file is a actual image or fake image
if(isset($_POST["submit"])) {
  $check = getimagesize($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"]);
  if($check !== false) {
    echo "File is an image - " . $check["mime"] . ".";
    $uploadOk = 1;
  } else {
    echo "File is not an image.";
    $uploadOk = 0;
  }
}

// Check if file already exists
if (file_exists($target_file)) {
  echo "Sorry, file already exists.";
  $uploadOk = 0;
}

// Check file size
if ($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["size"] > 500000) {
  echo "Sorry, your file is too large.";
  $uploadOk = 0;
}

// Allow certain file formats
if($imageFileType != "jpg" && $imageFileType != "png" && $imageFileType != "jpeg"
&& $imageFileType != "gif" ) {
  echo "Sorry, only JPG, JPEG, PNG & GIF files are allowed.";
  $uploadOk = 0;
}

// Check if $uploadOk is set to 0 by an error
if ($uploadOk == 0) {
  echo "Sorry, your file was not uploaded.";
// if everything is ok, try to upload file
} else {
  if (move_uploaded_file($_FILES["fileToUpload"]["tmp_name"], $target_file)) {
    echo "The file ". htmlspecialchars( basename( $_FILES["fileToUpload"]["name"])). " has been uploaded.";
  } else {
    echo "Sorry, there was an error uploading your file.";
  }
}
?>

content.text: Complete PHP Filesystem Reference
For a complete reference of filesystem functions, go to our complete PHP Filesystem Reference .
content.html: For a complete reference of filesystem functions, go to our complete PHP Filesystem Reference.
